post.summary: Creates a new constituent or merges data with an existing constituent
post.description: When merging, the database will look for a possible duplicate defined as a name plus one piece of contact info (address, email, or phone). If a duplicate is found, the data passed in will be merged into an existing constituent. If no duplicate is found, a new constituent will be created.  Note that this endpoint does not accept SecondaryAddresses, SecondaryEmails, or SecondaryPhones and you will receive an exception if you pass those in..

schema.description: Additional validation note - passing in SecondaryAddresses, SecondaryEmails, or SecondaryPhones will throw an exception.
